physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is square and it features eight people. All of them are facing the direction in which the photograph was captured. Two of them are women while the other six are men
 and they are all adorned in military uniform. Four of them are squatting down while the other four are standing behind them. The background of the photograph shows greenery and trees.
